description: Main source file for a Flutter application called 'Recipe Explorer'. It sets up the app's widget hierarchy, theming, routing, and state management with providers. Defines the root widget 'MyApp', the main scaffold with bottom navigation, and placeholder screens for Home, Search, and Favorites tabs.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, sets up providers, app theme, routing, and initial home widget.

classes.name: RootScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget that provides the main scaffold with bottom navigation and indexed stack for primary sections.

classes.name: _RootScaffoldState
classes.description: State class managing current tab index and page display.

classes.name: _HomeTabWrapper
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the Home tab content.

classes.name: _SearchTabWrapper
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the Search tab content.

classes.name: _FavoritesTabWrapper
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the Favorites tab content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that runs the Flutter app with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp widget; sets up providers and MaterialApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for RootScaffold; constructs the scaffold with app bar, body with IndexedStack, and bottom navigation bar.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the state object for RootScaffold.
